text: “Gua oragh. Livain anabamɨn adarazir tongɨn itir Kohatɨn ikɨzimɨn gumaziba, me nan bizir zuruzir kabar boroghɨn izɨtɨ, gua bar deraghvɨra men gan. Bar guizbangɨra, Kohatɨn ikɨzimɨn adarazi arazir kuratam damightɨ, kɨ me mɨsueghtɨ me arɨmɨghiregham. Kamaghɨn, Aron uan otariba ko, men ikɨzim faragh Purirpenimɨn aven mangɨ, bizir me damuamiba deraghvɨra vaghvagh men akakagh, me ateramin bizibar me mɨkɨm.
